entry.title: Severe Weather Statement issued May 22 at 2:32PM EDT until May 22 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...THE SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING FOR NORTHWESTERN LEE AND CENTRAL TERRELL COUNTIES IS CANCELLED... The storms which prompted the warning have weakened below severe limits, and have exited the warned area. Therefore, the warning has been cancelled. However gusty winds are still possible with these thunderstorms.
